p.k: Animation, Short, Drama Croatia (2016). Re≈æie: Martina Mestrovic.
p.d: A universal parable about differences, told in three colours. A story about the natural and the excluded, the normal and the uncommon; a duel between learned binary oppositions. The film reflects on an important issue: If our nature isn't a threat to anyone, then who or what prevents us from living our life - possibly the only one we have - to the fullest?
